string-array.name: dbcreate
string-array.item: create table User( ID integer primary key auto increment, Name varchar(20) not null, Password varchar(64), AES varchar(256), RSAPrivate varchar(256), RSAPublic varchar(256) )

create table Devices( ID integer primary key auto increment, Address varchar(17) not null, DeviceName varchar(20) not null, FriendlyName varchar(20) not null, Paired integer not null, LastSeen integer default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )

create table Friends( ID integer primary key auto increment, UserID integer not null, DeviceID integer not null, foreign key(UserID) references User(ID), foreign key(DeviceID) references Devices(ID) )

create table Send( ID integer primary key auto increment, Text varchar(1024) not null, Timestamp integer default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP UserID integer not null, DeviceID integer not null, foreign key(UserID) references User(ID), foreign key(DeviceID) references Devices(ID) )

create table Received( ID integer primary key auto increment, Text varchar(1024) not null, Timestamp integer default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP UserID integer not null, DeviceID integer not null, foreign key(UserID) references User(ID), foreign key(DeviceID) references Devices(ID) )
create table AES( ID integer primary key auto increment, Key varchar(256), DeviceID integer not null, foreign key(DeviceID) references Devices(ID) )
create table RSA( ID integer primary key auto increment, Key varchar(256), DeviceID integer not null, foreign key(DeviceID) references Devices(ID) )
